name: Itano Circus #01 [EBB VOL.4]
description: Itano Circus refers to a highly stylized and acrobatic method of depicting aerial combat and dogfights in many anime (Wikipedia). It inspired countless anime series. I was overwhelmed when I first saw it. Trying to mimic its visual impact has been one of my goals when creating live visuals. This is a piece of live visuals for EBB VOL.4‭ ‬Audiovisualizer in da‭ ‬空總. Special Thanks to 3D artists Vertex Cat and Art Force for the chicken and the spaceship models.
